details.title: Inside the Inner City
details.abstract: A review of the conditions existing in urban areas and a review of the Model Urban Neighborhood Development (MUND) Program in Baltimore are presented. An appeal is voiced for a reversal of national priorities in the interest of national survival and the public interest with regard to housing, urban goals, and social problems so that the quality of life for our cities and their people may be improved.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
